--- title: "Data Wrangling" author: "Navaneet Sridhar" --- #Load Libraries ::: {.cell hash='03_data_wrangling_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_d36347e4c05113adac98df0b832c0443'} ```{.r .cell-code} library(tidyverse) library(vroom) library(data.table) library(tictoc) library(dplyr) library(readxl) ``` ::: # Define column types for vroom ::: {.cell hash='03_data_wrangling_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_bb24549244947b5271932f59b5bfcb67'} ```{.r .cell-code} col_types <- list( id = col_character(), type = col_character(), number = col_character(), country = col_character(), date = col_date("%Y-%m-%d"), abstract = col_character(), title = col_character(), kind = col_character(), num_claims = col_double(), filename = col_character(), withdrawn = col_double() ) ``` ::: # The reduced data set for the year 2014 read into a tibble ::: {.cell hash='03_data_wrangling_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_eef09f35ee0c10f1e0216358cc62f5df'} ```{.r .cell-code} patent_tbl <- vroom( file = "C:/Users/navan/OneDrive/Desktop/BM/ss23-bdsb-NavaneetS/assets/Wrangling/Patent_data_reduced/patent.tsv", delim = "\t" #col_types = col_types, #na = c("", "NA", "NULL") ) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` #> Rows: 327014 Columns: 3 #> ── Column specification ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────── #> Delimiter: "\t" #> chr (1): id #> dbl (1): num_claims #> date (1): date #> #> ℹ Use `spec()` to retrieve the full column specification for this data. #> ℹ Specify the column types or set `show_col_types = FALSE` to quiet this message. ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} assignee_tbl <- vroom( file = "C:/Users/navan/OneDrive/Desktop/BM/ss23-bdsb-NavaneetS/assets/Wrangling/Patent_data_reduced/assignee.tsv", delim = "\t", col_types = col_types, na = c("", "NA", "NULL") ) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` #> Warning: The following named parsers don't match the column names: number, #> country, date, abstract, title, kind, num_claims, filename, withdrawn ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} patent_assignee_tbl <- vroom( file = "C:/Users/navan/OneDrive/Desktop/BM/ss23-bdsb-NavaneetS/assets/Wrangling/Patent_data_reduced/patent_assignee.tsv", delim = "\t", col_types = col_types, na = c("", "NA", "NULL") ) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` #> Warning: The following named parsers don't match the column names: id, type, #> number, country, date, abstract, title, kind, num_claims, filename, withdrawn ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} uspc_tbl <- vroom( file = "C:/Users/navan/OneDrive/Desktop/BM/ss23-bdsb-NavaneetS/assets/Wrangling/Patent_data_reduced/uspc.tsv", delim = "\t", col_types = col_types, na = c("", "NA", "NULL") ) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` #> Warning: The following named parsers don't match the column names: id, type, #> number, country, date, abstract, title, kind, num_claims, filename, withdrawn ``` ::: ::: #Joining the tables ::: {.cell hash='03_data_wrangling_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_a8914684874785002462e78219ba407f'} ```{.r .cell-code} patent_joined_table <- patent_assignee_tbl %>% inner_join(assignee_tbl, by = c("assignee_id" = "id")) %>% inner_join(patent_tbl, by = c("patent_id" = "id")) ``` ::: #List of 10 US companies with the most assigned/granted patents. ::: {.cell hash='03_data_wrangling_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-5_0f5ecc1db70d7689016b0839007d0df9'} ```{.r .cell-code} us_patent_counts <- patent_joined_table %>% group_by(organization) %>% summarise(total_patents = n()) %>% arrange(desc(total_patents)) top_10_us_companies <- head(us_patent_counts, 10) top_10_us_companies ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: ::: #List the top 10 companies with the most new granted patents for August 2014. ::: {.cell hash='03_data_wrangling_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-6_e65fa46d2f261a6969c93579a9bb3ed4'} ```{.r .cell-code} us_patent_counts_aug_2014 <- patent_joined_table %>% filter(format(date, "%Y-%m") == "2014-08") %>% group_by(organization) %>% summarise(total_patents = n()) %>% arrange(desc(total_patents)) %>% select(organization, total_patents) top_10_us_companies_aug_2014 <- head(us_patent_counts_aug_2014, 10) top_10_us_companies_aug_2014 ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: :::
